resources.string: USER HELP: MAIN MENU In this menu you will find a list of different functions with which you can interact, click on them to access the activity

USER HELP: DAILY MENU To start creating your diary, click on the button with the \'+\' sign in the bottom right. Once you create your diaries, they will be placed in the activity. With the search bar you can filter newspapers by words or dates.

USER HELP: ADD JOURNAL MENU To add your diaries, the current time comes by default along with the day, with which you will only have to fill in the description section. Once you fill it out, click on the button with the \'+\' sign located below and your journal sheet will be created. You have the possibility to share it through the share button located above in the top menu

USER HELP: MENU ADD NOTE To add your notes you have to fill in the title and description field. Once you fill it out, click on the button with the \'+\' sign located below and your journal sheet will be created. You have the possibility to share it using the share button located above in the top menu or to add images from your gallery by clicking on the clip located at the top right

USER HELP: MENU ADD NOTE To add your notes you have to fill in the title and description field. Once you fill it out, click on the button with the \'+\' sign located below and your journal sheet will be created. You have the possibility to share it using the share button located above in the top menu or to add images from your gallery by clicking on the clip located at the top right

HELP USER REMINDERS: In this activity you can insert a reminder by adding the time with the \'choose time\' button. Once we have the reminder created we will give the save button and it will take us to the menu
